text: Another long night, this joint venture was your idea and the consultants love it,
Lyle's company has grown by 8% annually like clockwork.
His revenue stream must be off the books, maybe even illegal.
Just needed a closer look at their books.
Anything else you can trouble me for?
Yeah, three buttons, it's a little nighties, Mr. Wayne.
I'm not in talking fashion, Mr. Fox, so much as Fox.
You want to be able to turn your head, and show me back and out of the driveway easier.
I'll see what I can do.
